__e: So how is it you come from such a religious family and you end up... not?
I couldn't sleep tonight... so I came down, I started watching TV... and there was this Bible program on, and it was like...
So, now, you know, I'm gonna be straight with you, 'cause you know I'm a Christian woman and you are now and always will by my Lord and savior and I will love you until the day I die.
